newsitem.title: USA: Value Health sets June 18 mtg for merger vote.
newsitem.headline: Value Health sets June 18 mtg for merger vote.

text.p: Value Health Inc on Monday said it set June 18 as the date for a special meeting of shareholders to vote on a proposed merger between Columbia/HCA Healthcare Corp and Value Health.
Shareholders of Value Health common stock as of April 30 will be eligible to vote at the meeting, the company said.
Value Health provides specialty benefit programs to corporations, insurance carriers and managed care organizations.
The meeting will be held in Avon, Conn., at 1 Nod Road.
